email_group_1.subject: Mandatory Training Update
email_group_1.desc: Dear Team, We would like to inform you that there is a mandatory training session scheduled for next week. This training is crucial for your professional development and will cover essential topics that are relevant to your role. Please find attached the training materials that you need to review before the session. It is important that you complete the pre-training assessment which is also included in the attachment. Failure to attend the training may result in a review of your current position. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out. Best, HR Team.
email_group_1.explain: The email is from HR and contains a legitimate training attachment.

email_group_1.subject: Urgent: Update Your Payment Information
email_group_1.desc: Dear Employee, We have noticed an issue with your payment information and need you to update it immediately to avoid any disruptions in your salary. Please find the attached document which contains the necessary steps to update your information. It is crucial that you complete this as soon as possible. Thank you, Finance Department.
email_group_1.explain: The email requests sensitive information and includes a malicious attachment.

email_group_2.subject: New IT Security Protocols
email_group_2.desc: Hello Team, As part of our ongoing efforts to enhance security, we are implementing new IT security protocols. This includes mandatory password updates and the use of two-factor authentication for all systems. Please make sure to follow the guidelines outlined in our internal portal. If you have questions, please do not hesitate to reach out to the IT helpdesk. Thank you for your cooperation. Regards, IT Department.
email_group_2.explain: The email provides information about security protocols without requesting sensitive information.

email_group_2.subject: Immediate Action Required: Account Verification
email_group_2.desc: Dear User, We have detected unusual activity on your account and require immediate verification to secure your information. Please download the attached verification form and follow the instructions carefully. Failure to complete this may result in account suspension. Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter. Sincerely, Support Team.
email_group_2.explain: The email creates a sense of urgency and includes a harmful attachment.

email_group_3.subject: Quarterly Performance Review Schedule
email_group_3.desc: Dear Team, We are pleased to announce that the schedule for the quarterly performance reviews has been finalized. Each of you will receive an individual invite for your review session. Please prepare any necessary documents and feedback you would like to discuss. If you have any questions regarding the process, please reach out to HR. Best regards, HR Team.
email_group_3.explain: The email is informative and does not ask for sensitive information.

email_group_3.subject: Action Required: Update Your Security Settings
email_group_3.desc: Attention, We have identified vulnerabilities in your current security settings. To protect your account, please download the attached file and follow the instructions to update your settings. This is an urgent matter, and your prompt action is required. Thank you, Security Team.
email_group_3.explain: The email pressures the user to act quickly and contains a malicious attachment.

email_group_4.subject: Upcoming Company Retreat Details
email_group_4.desc: Hello Team, We are excited to announce the details of our upcoming company retreat. This is a great opportunity for team building and relaxation. Please find attached the itinerary and important information regarding travel arrangements. We encourage everyone to participate and make the most of this experience. If you have any questions, please feel free to reach out. Best, Travel Department.
email_group_4.explain: The email provides details about a company event with a legitimate attachment.

email_group_4.subject: Your Account Needs Immediate Verification
email_group_4.desc: Dear Employee, We have detected suspicious activity on your account. To secure your information, please verify your account by downloading the attached document and following the instructions. This is a time-sensitive issue that requires your immediate attention. Regards, Admin Team.
email_group_4.explain: The email contains a sense of urgency and a harmful attachment.

email_group_5.subject: New Policy on Remote Work
email_group_5.desc: Dear Employees, We are implementing a new policy regarding remote work arrangements. This policy aims to provide clarity and ensure compliance with legal standards. Please review the policy on the company intranet and reach out to the legal department if you have any questions. Thank you for your cooperation. Best, Legal Team.
email_group_5.explain: The email informs employees about a policy change without requesting sensitive information.
